title: Calories in Wendy's Large Chili
meta_description: Learn calories in Wendy's large chili: 340 kcal per serving, with full nutrition facts on protein, carbs, fiber, sodium, and quick tweaks for customizations.
assumptions: Wendy's restaurant large chili (12 oz serving), standard beef and bean recipe, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check Wendy's app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One large Wendy's chili provides 340 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Opt for small chili instead (8 oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in Wendy's large chili?
What's the protein content in Wendy's large chili?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per large chili.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Wendy's large chili?
faqs.a: Around 1630 mg of sodium per serving.

faqs.q: Does Wendy's large chili have fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, 12 g of dietary fiber from beans and veggies.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Wendy's chili?
faqs.a: 38 g total carbs, including 8 g sugars and 12 g fiber.
